column1: #Text=I do n't have an opinion on Woodward ; he 's been successful .
#Text=I mean , when I was a young man there was a James Reston .
#Text=I wrote about him in The Kingdom of Power a lot .
#Text=He was the most important reporter when I was coming up in the 1950 's , and he was in Washington and in bed with the enemy all the time .
#Text=He had sources in the administration of Kennedy , of Eisenhower before Kennedy , or Johnson .
#Text=He was a guy who liked power and liked being around power , and he was very much a patriot writer .
#Text=He was very popular and wrote easy-to-read pieces .
#Text=When I was in my teens and early twenties my travels were very Europe-centric .

#Text=But as an adult I have been drawn to places either seemingly " dangerous " to me or places that I do n't feel like I know because I 've read so much about them or seen so often in books and magazines .
#Text=So Europe is off my map now , though I did sneak into Cuba .
#Text=Gay Talese at The Strand bookstore promoting A Writer 's Life in 2006 . photo : David Shankbone
#Text=DS : Just took a flight on Aero Caribbean .
#Text=But back then , they were very much encouraging American tourists to come via Mexico .
#Text=And I did n't sneak in , but I had to get a visa from the Czechoslovakian Embassy in Washington to get in there in ' 82 .
#Text=was in power then and he did n't want me to go to Cuba .
#Text=My wife also went for two weeks .
#Text=And now you do n't have the dollar .
#Text=DS : I 'm not really sure now because when I was there they had the system where you could actually just use dollars .
#Text=The local currency was called pesos convertibles that were convertible into dollars .
#Text=Of course they have no value anywhere else in the world except in Cuba , but then they stopped doing that .
#Text=Castro has kind of created Batista ' s society in some ways ; not in every way .
#Text=The poor are certainly a lot better off than they were under Batista .
#Text=But with the embargo , the economy is now very tourist-based , which creates this tourist class .
#Text=We did n't stay in the hotels .
#Text=We wanted to stay in what they call casa particulars and I remember talking to a woman who made $ 30 a month as a doctor .
#Text=But running this casa particular , she was making around $ 300 , $ 500 a month , which made her very rich .
